name: Pineapple
description: A tropical fruit with spiky skin and sweet, tangy yellow flesh, often used in desserts and juices.

name: Truck
description: A large motor vehicle designed to transport goods or heavy loads over long distances.

name: Sphere
description: A perfectly round 3D shape where every point on the surface is equidistant from the center.

name: Square
description: A flat shape with four equal sides and four right angles, often used in geometry and design.

name: Beagle
description: A small, friendly dog breed known for its strong sense of smell and energetic personality.

name: Helicopter
description: An aircraft that flies using rotating blades, capable of vertical takeoff and hovering in one spot.

name: Police Car
description: A vehicle used by law enforcement officers for patrolling and responding to emergencies.

name: Watermelon
description: A large, juicy fruit with green rind and red flesh filled with black seeds, popular in summer.

name: Kiwi
description: A small, brown, fuzzy fruit with bright green flesh and tiny black seeds, rich in vitamin C.

name: Tank
description: A heavily armored military vehicle equipped with large guns, used in combat operations.

name: Pear
description: A sweet fruit with a bell-like shape and smooth, green or yellow skin.

name: Circle
description: A 2D shape where all points are equally distant from a central point.

name: Diamond
description: A geometric shape with four equal sides set at an angle, resembling a tilted square.

name: Train
description: A series of connected vehicles that run along rails, used for transporting people or goods.

name: Lime
description: A small green citrus fruit known for its sour taste and refreshing aroma.

name: Heart
description: A symbol representing love, compassion, and emotion, often drawn with two curves meeting at a point.

name: Cow
description: A large domesticated animal raised for milk, meat, and leather.

name: Pig
description: A farm animal known for its intelligence, pinkish skin, and use in producing pork products.

name: Alligator
description: A large reptile with a powerful jaw and thick skin, found in freshwater habitats.

name: Snake
description: A legless reptile with a long, slender body that moves by slithering.

name: Star
description: A five-pointed shape often used to symbolize excellence, light, or fame.

name: Capuchin
description: A small, intelligent monkey species known for its expressive face and curiosity.

name: Lemon
description: A bright yellow citrus fruit with a tangy, acidic taste, rich in vitamin C.

name: Unicycle
description: A single-wheeled cycle often used in circuses and balance training.

name: Hot Air Balloon
description: A large balloon filled with heated air that carries passengers in a basket through the sky.

name: Passion Fruit
description: A tropical fruit with a tough rind and sweet-tart pulp filled with edible seeds.

name: Banana
description: A long, curved yellow fruit that is soft and sweet inside, rich in potassium.

name: Rooster
description: A male chicken known for its colorful feathers and early morning crowing.

name: Plum
description: A small, juicy fruit with smooth skin and a single pit in the center.

name: Hexagon
description: A polygon with six equal sides and six angles, often seen in honeycombs.

name: Pomegranate
description: A round fruit filled with juicy red seeds, rich in antioxidants and nutrients.

name: Triangle
description: A shape with three sides and three angles, one of the basic geometric forms.

name: Motorcycle
description: A two-wheeled motor vehicle designed for fast travel and maneuverability.

name: Apple Green
description: A variety of apple with crisp, tart green skin and juicy flesh.

name: Strawberries
description: Small red fruits with a sweet flavor and tiny seeds on their surface.

name: Apple
description: A popular fruit with smooth skin and crisp, juicy flesh, available in red, green, and yellow varieties.

name: Orange
description: A round citrus fruit known for its bright color, sweet flavor, and vitamin C content.

name: Mango
description: A sweet, tropical fruit with smooth skin and juicy orange flesh surrounding a large seed.

name: Papaya
description: A tropical fruit with orange flesh, black seeds, and a mildly sweet flavor.

name: Rectangle
description: A four-sided shape with opposite sides equal and all angles at 90 degrees.

name: Avocado
description: A creamy green fruit rich in healthy fats, often used in salads and spreads.

name: Tangerine
description: A small orange citrus fruit that is easy to peel and sweet in flavor.

name: Cube
description: A three-dimensional shape with six equal square faces, like a dice.

name: Goat
description: A farm animal with horns and a beard, known for producing milk and being a good climber.

name: Tiger
description: A large striped wild cat known for its strength, speed, and predatory skills.

name: Bicycle
description: A two-wheeled human-powered vehicle propelled by pedaling.

name: Ambulance
description: A medical emergency vehicle equipped to transport patients to hospitals.

name: Boat
description: A watercraft designed to float and move across lakes, rivers, or oceans.

name: Tomato
description: A red, juicy fruit often used in salads and sauces, botanically a fruit but treated as a vegetable.

name: Coconut
description: A large tropical fruit with a hard shell, fibrous husk, and edible white flesh.

name: Airplane
description: A powered flying vehicle with fixed wings and engines that enable flight.

name: Pentagon Shape
description: A five-sided polygon often used in design and architecture.

name: Blueberries
description: Small, round blue fruits that are sweet, nutritious, and packed with antioxidants.

name: Horse
description: A strong, fast mammal domesticated for riding, racing, and farm work.

name: Cone Shape
description: A 3D geometric shape with a circular base that tapers to a single point.

name: Cat
description: A small domesticated feline known for its agility, curiosity, and playful nature.

name: Peach
description: A soft, fuzzy fruit with juicy yellow or pink flesh and a large pit.

name: Bus
description: A large motor vehicle designed to carry multiple passengers along fixed routes.

name: Jeep
description: A rugged, four-wheel-drive vehicle designed for off-road and outdoor travel.

name: Rabbit
description: A small, furry animal with long ears and strong hind legs, known for hopping and burrowing.

name: Cherry
description: A small red fruit with a sweet or tart flavor and a single seed inside.

name: Cylinder
description: A 3D shape with two parallel circular bases connected by a curved surface.

name: Pyramid
description: A solid shape with a polygon base and triangular sides that meet at a point.
